content: Revenues for the second quarter of 2022 increase 73% to $3.3 million, compared to revenue of $1.9 million in the same quarter last year. Due to increase revenues generated by the TRxADE platform and TRxADE Prime, gross profit increased to $1.2 million in the second quarter of 2022, compared to $800,000 for the same period in 2021. Operating expenses in the second quarter of 2022 were $2.3 million, compared to $3.4 million in the same quarter last year. Net loss in the second quarter of 2022 was $1.1 million or $0.13 per basic and diluted share outstanding, compared to $2.6 million or $0.32 per basic and diluted share outstanding for the same quarter in 2021. Adjusted EBITDA, a non-GAAP financial measure was a negative $1.1 million for the quarter ended June 30, 2022, compared to negative $1.2 million in the same quarter last year.
